Min_Parking_Spaces: No off-street parking required for ADUs
Owner_Occupancy_Required: Owner occupancy requirement repealed by HB 1337 (2023); City code to be updated.
Short_Term_Rental_Allowed: Occupancy limits as applicable per adopted codes and regulations.
Min_Separation_From_Primary_ft: Design requirements for accessory dwelling units per LUC 20.20.120; Detached accessory structure regulations per LUC 20.20.125.
Design_Standards_Notes: ADU entrance design must maintain single-house appearance per LUC 20.20.120.
Impact_Fees_Notes: No income-restricted affordability requirement for ADUs at this time.
Last_Reviewed_Date: General ADU regulations citywide; additional district-specific use and dimensional standards apply per LUC 20.25A-20.25Q.
Alt_Max_Impervious_Surface_Percent: Front yard greenscape requirements apply where applicable.
ADU_Conversion_Allowed: Conversion of existing floor area or accessory structure to ADU allowed subject to applicable standards and building regulations; street parking is not required specifically for conversion ADUs.
ADU_Conversion_Notes: Two ADUs per lot (typically one attached and one detached) allowed in single-family and multifamily zones; subject to residual lot-specific limits in the applicable land use district.
ADU_Site_Limit_Notes: Detached ADUs must meet LUC 20.20.125, including structure height, lot coverage, and setback requirements; setbacks are typically at least 5 feet unless otherwise allowed.
DADU_Setback_Notes: Critical areas, steep slopes, and other sensitive features may constrain where an ADU or DADU can be built on a given lot.
Critical_Area_Notes: Landscaping, tree preservation, and design requirements apply per LUC 20.20 and 20.20.900.

ADU_Site_Limit_Notes: Detached ADUs must meet LUC 20.20.125, including structure height, lot coverage, and setback requirements; typical side and rear setbacks include 5-ft side and 5-ft rear setback, with limited encroachments where allowed.
DADU_Setback_Notes: Critical areas and overlays may further restrict ADU/DADU placement.
